channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Migration, Backup, Staging
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Migration, Backup, Staging

item.title: CVE-2024-7315|2024-10-02T16:33:45.248Z -- unknown -- migration%2C%20backup%2C%20staging
item.description: The Migration, Backup, Staging WordPress plugin before 0.9.106 does not use sufficient randomness in the filename that is created when generating a backup, which could be bruteforced by attackers to leak sensitive information about said backups.

item.title: CVE-2024-7315|2024-10-02T06:00:02.453Z -- unknown -- migration%2C%20backup%2C%20staging
item.description: The Migration, Backup, Staging WordPress plugin before 0.9.106 does not use sufficient randomness in the filename that is created when generating a backup, which could be bruteforced by attackers to leak sensitive information about said backups.
